mean_en: of or relating to the time during the Stone Age when people used stone tools and began to grow crops, raise animals, and live together in large groups but did not read or write
word_etyma: neo新 + lithic石的 → neolithic 新石器时代的
sentence: In the neolithic age, man learned to make weapons using stone and wood.
sentence_trans: 在新石器时代，人类学会了用石头和木材制作武器。
